MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the EH21 postcode area of Musselburgh, affecting properties in Pinkie Drive. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to repair a faulty cable on the electrical network.  we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:10pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:50pm on Thursday, 10th December 2020
